Clients

Class CustomerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • Clients.ClientFacade
      • Clients.CustomerFacade

  • public class CustomerFacade
extends ClientFacade
    object returned when user logs in as customer. in charge of login and DBDAO actions for customers.
    See Also:
    Customer, Coupon

      • purchaseCoupon

        public void purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
        adds a new coupon puchase to the customer

        this also checks the coupon is available, not out of date and is not already owned by the customer.

        Parameters:
        coupon - the coupon to be purchased by the customer
        Throws:
        coupon - out of stock!
        coupon - out of date!
        coupon - already owned by customer!
        See Also:
        DB.couponsDBDAO

      • getCustomerCoupons

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getCustomerCoupons()
        returns a list of all customer coupons
        Returns:
        ArrayList of coupons belonging to this customer
        Throws:
        customer - has no coupons
        See Also:
        DB.CouponDBDAO, Coupon, CustomerDBDAO

      • getCustomerCoupons

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getCustomerCoupons(java.util.Locale.Category category)
        returns a list of all customer coupons of a specified category
        Parameters:
        Category - the category of coupons to be returnes
        Returns:
        ArrayList of coupons belonging to this customer of specified category
        Throws:

        See Also:

      • getCustomerCoupons

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getCustomerCoupons(double maxPrice)
        returns a list of all customer coupons lower than input price
        Parameters:
        maxprice - the maximum price of returned coupons
        Returns:
        ArrayList of coupons belonging to this customer of limited price
        Throws:
        customer - has no coupons
        See Also:
        DB.customerDBDAO, Coupon, JavaBeans.Category
